content:
Hello,
I have a question from the team, has anyone implemented the Practitioner.qualification.code value set? https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v2/0360/2.7/index.html
Any guidance that might clarify the definition of practitioner qualification based on the value set?

Our only project involved in values for qualification code side-stepped the issue by using an Australian extension for the values we were interested in, none of which were in the example value set. See https://build.fhir.org/ig/ci-collaborative/au-fhir-base-r4//StructureDefinition-au-practitioner.html
